title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Reimagining AWS operations with autonomous AI agents (DEV207)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 利用自主AI代理重新构想AWS运营 (DEV207)
abstract: AI agents can take on routine operational tasks and reduce manual effort. This session explores how autonomous agents monitor, analyze, and respond to AWS workloads in real time. Learn design patterns, integration strategies, and guardrails to ensure reliability while accelerating operations with AI.
abstract_cn: AI 代理可以承担日常运营任务并减少人工工作量。本次会议探讨自主代理如何实时监控、分析和响应 AWS 工作负载。了解设计模式、集成策略和护栏机制，以确保可靠性，同时通过 AI 加速运营。
